author.bio: NET JRF Qualified | Political Science ll YouTube Channel- Kamalvir Singh  ll 5 Year Teaching Experience

results.description:
In this course, Kamalvir Singh will discuss important topics of UGC NET Indian Political Thought: 
Dharmashastra, Kautilya, Aggannasutta, Barani, Kabir, Pandita Ramabai, Bal Gangadhar Tilak, Swami Vivekanand, Rabindranath Tagore, M.K Gandhi, Sri Aurobindo, Periyar E. V. Ramasamy, Muhammad Iqbal, M.N.Roy, V D Savarkar,
Dr. B.R.Ambedkar, J L Nehru, Ram Manohar Lohia, Jaya Prakash Narayan, Deendayal Upadhyaya. The course will be delivered in Hindi and notes for the same will be provided in English.
results.name: Detailed Course on Indian Political Thought

properties.name: Doubt Clearing Session and Political Thought of Deendayal Upadhyaya
